'''1.9.4''' is a minor update to {{JE}} released on May 10, 2016,<ref>{{link|url=https://www.mojang.com/2016/05/minecraft-193/||archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2016/05/minecraft-193/|title=Minecraft 1.9.4|author=Searge|website=Mojang.com|date=May 10, 2016}}</ref> which fixes bugs. It is compatible with [[Java Edition 1.9.3|1.9.3]] servers.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''Warnings'''
* Removed incorrect snapshot version warning when loading a world saved in an older version.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.9.4|prefix=Minecraft
|;From released versions before 1.9
|92057|Particles are dark at Y&ge;256.
|;From 1.9
|94670|Bat subtitle is misspelled ("squeeks").
|95574|Minecraft freezes when window loses focus.
|100116|<nowiki>[r=x]</nowiki> selector is not selecting mobs or players in the full radius when ran in command blocks.
|;From 1.9.2
|100313|Sweep attack sometimes does not work after switching slot while standing still.
}}</onlyinclude>
